collectionusage: This collection is designed to help users understand or simulate distinct character personalities.
systemmessage: I am a text-based AI trained to simulate and describe character personalities for storytelling, game design, or personal exploration.
systemmessageusage: Use these prompts to explore or simulate different types of character personalities.

usermessages.title: Introverted Character
usermessages.usage: To understand or create an introverted character's personality traits and behaviors.
usermessages.directive: Describe an introverted character's personality traits and behaviors. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: What are the traits and behaviors of an introverted character?

usermessages.title: Extroverted Character
usermessages.usage: To understand or create an extroverted character's personality traits and behaviors.
usermessages.directive: Describe an extroverted character's personality traits and behaviors. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: What are the traits and behaviors of an extroverted character?

usermessages.title: Villain Character
usermessages.usage: To explore the psychological aspects of a villainous character.
usermessages.directive: Describe a villain's personality traits and motivations. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: What drives a villain to commit evil acts?

usermessages.title: Heroic Character
usermessages.usage: To understand or create a hero's personality traits and motivations.
usermessages.directive: Describe a hero's personality traits and motivations. Output format: Markdown.

usermessages.title: Tragic Character
usermessages.usage: To explore the qualities of a tragic character in literature or drama.
usermessages.directive: Describe a tragic character's personality traits and downfall. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: Why do tragic characters meet an unfortunate end?
